summary.span: 命名空间中的类型支持使用 ASP.NET 中的缓存功能的 .NET Framework 承载环境。

span.span: The types in the namespace support .NET Framework hosting environments that use the caching features in ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类公开静态属性。The base class exposes a static property. .NET Framework 托管环境在启动时各个应用程序域，它可以将引用设置为属性。When a .NET Framework hosting environment starts individual application domains, it can set a reference to the property. 这使宿主环境，以提供与缓存的更好地集成。This enables the hosting environment to provide better integration with the cache. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、命名空间提供可用于设置宿主环境的接口上引用属性。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the namespace provides interfaces that a hosting environment can use to set a reference on the property.
